com.beepell.execution
Interface ExecutionContext

All Superinterfaces:
ExpressionContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
CorrelationContext, ExecutionContextImpl, TransactionalExecutionContext
public interface ExecutionContext
extends ExpressionContext

Author:
Tim Hallwyl

initializeVariable

void initializeVariable(String variable)
Initialize a variable, if not initialized. If the variable is already initialized then this has no effect. Used in assign-copy-to.

getLinkState

Boolean getLinkState(String link)
Gets the link state as a Boolean object. This method returns null if the link state is unset, otherwise true or false.

Specified by:
getLinkState in interface ExpressionContext
Parameters:
link - name of the link.
localPart -
Returns:

setInitialStartingActivityReady

void setInitialStartingActivityReady(InboundMessageActivity activity)
This method is invoked by the initial starting activity after it has registered with the message broker, but before it starts waiting for the message. This will in turn make the inbound message handler deliver the message which created the instance (it has already been received).

Parameters:
activity - the initial starting activity itself.

getInitialOnMessage

OnMessage getInitialOnMessage()
Gets the initial OnMessage that the initial starting message is targeted to.

Returns:
the initial OnMessage

setInitialStartingActivityComplete

void setInitialStartingActivityComplete(Activity activity)
This method is invoked by the initial starting activity when it has completed. It will in turn make the process instance change state from STARTING to RUNNING and allow other starting activities to be executed.

Parameters:
activity -

notifyOnRunningState

void notifyOnRunningState(Object object)
This method is invoked by other starting activities than the initial starting activity, to be notified then the process goes into RUNNING state.

Parameters:
object -
